original_title: The Irish Rovers, 50th Anniversary LIVE on St. Patrick's Day
overview: For the first time on DVD see the Rovers up close and personal while enjoying front row tickets to the show. See what happens when things go wrong or the lads try to crack each other up on stage. This time, cameras keep rolling! No retakes!
title: The Irish Rovers, 50th Anniversary LIVE on St. Patrick's Day
